content.raw:
We would like to be able to move the fingers at the maximum velocity of the real hand. (do you have any data on that?).

We will try to change the parameters and see how it works for us, given a good balance between realistic inertia, damping and maximum velocity. Other teams might have input on this as well.
content.html:
We would like to be able to move the fingers at the maximum velocity of the real hand. (do you have any data on that?).

We will try to change the parameters and see how it works for us, given a good balance between realistic inertia, damping and maximum velocity. Other teams might have input on this as well.
